pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for John Danks; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .199 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .234 off him after that.
John Danks has his out pitch working, recording 3 of his 4 strikeouts with the changeup so far.
